name: Chromatic scales, Chromatic scale with sharps
test_code:
let
  Test.label.deprecated "Chromatic scales, Chromatic scale with sharps" <| Test.expect (chromatic "C" === ["C","C#","D","D#","E","F","F#","G","G#","A","A#","B"])

name: Chromatic scales, Chromatic scale with flats
test_code:
let
  Test.label.deprecated "Chromatic scales, Chromatic scale with flats" <| Test.expect (chromatic "F" === ["F","Gb","G","Ab","A","Bb","B","C","Db","D","Eb","E"])

name: Scales with specified intervals, Simple major scale
test_code:
let
  Test.label.deprecated "Scales with specified intervals, Simple major scale" <| Test.expect (interval "C" "MMmMMMm" === ["C","D","E","F","G","A","B","C"])

name: Scales with specified intervals, Major scale with sharps
test_code:
let
  Test.label.deprecated "Scales with specified intervals, Major scale with sharps" <| Test.expect (interval "G" "MMmMMMm" === ["G","A","B","C","D","E","F#","G"])

name: Scales with specified intervals, Major scale with flats
test_code:
let
  Test.label.deprecated "Scales with specified intervals, Major scale with flats" <| Test.expect (interval "F" "MMmMMMm" === ["F","G","A","Bb","C","D","E","F"])

name: Scales with specified intervals, Minor scale with sharps
test_code:
let
  Test.label.deprecated "Scales with specified intervals, Minor scale with sharps" <| Test.expect (interval "f#" "MmMMmMM" === ["F#","G#","A","B","C#","D","E","F#"])

name: Scales with specified intervals, Minor scale with flats
test_code:
let
  Test.label.deprecated "Scales with specified intervals, Minor scale with flats" <| Test.expect (interval "bb" "MmMMmMM" === ["Bb","C","Db","Eb","F","Gb","Ab","Bb"])

name: Scales with specified intervals, Dorian mode
test_code:
let
  Test.label.deprecated "Scales with specified intervals, Dorian mode" <| Test.expect (interval "d" "MmMMMmM" === ["D","E","F","G","A","B","C","D"])

test_code:
let
  Test.label.deprecated "Scales with specified intervals, Mixolydian mode" <| Test.expect (interval "Eb" "MMmMMmM" === ["Eb","F","G","Ab","Bb","C","Db","Eb"])

test_code:
let
  Test.label.deprecated "Scales with specified intervals, Lydian mode" <| Test.expect (interval "a" "MMMmMMm" === ["A","B","C#","D#","E","F#","G#","A"])

test_code:
let
  Test.label.deprecated "Scales with specified intervals, Phrygian mode" <| Test.expect (interval "e" "mMMMmMM" === ["E","F","G","A","B","C","D","E"])

test_code:

  Test.label.deprecated "Scales with specified intervals, Locrian mode" <| Test.expect (interval "g" "mMMmMMM" === ["G","Ab","Bb","C","Db","Eb","F","G"])

test_code:

  Test.label.deprecated "Scales with specified intervals, Harmonic minor" <| Test.expect (interval "d" "MmMMmAm" === ["D","E","F","G","A","Bb","Db","D"])
